body: This is needed for TokTok/toxcore#4. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/hstox/24)

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/6937653/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/6937653)

Coverage increased (+0.4%) to 91.111% when pulling **16a9a0039cbde6f6f00eca2018731da4f1ef3c23 on iphydf:coverage** into **886eecdf305c7b884d90e0f9c3d3ea5d53a28a02 on TokTok:master**.

Reviewed 1 of 5 files at r1, 1 of 2 files at r2.
Review status: 2 of 5 files reviewed at latest revision, 5 unresolved discussions.

---

_[Makefile, line 17 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/24#-KMG39TbxlzMRYsilsTR:-KMG39TcZ1IpbHyjWDCn:-1320530583) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/16a9a0039cbde6f6f00eca2018731da4f1ef3c23/Makefile#L17)):_

> ``` Makefile
> 
> # Test flavour. See test/toxcore/Makefile for choices.
> TEST  := vanilla
> ```

if flavor is only for toxcore, shouldn't this have a different name?

---

_[Makefile, line 32 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/24#-KMG3If29WRfCMd1V1vz:-KMG3If29WRfCMd1V1w-:-164527923) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/16a9a0039cbde6f6f00eca2018731da4f1ef3c23/Makefile#L32)):_

> ``` Makefile
>   --extra-lib-dirs=$(HOME)/.cabal/extra-dist/lib
> 
> all: check $(DOCS)
> ```

why $(DOCS)

---

_[Makefile, line 36 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/24#-KMG4VlaLboNSJouPXPs:-KMG4VlaLboNSJouPXPt:-2116256070) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/16a9a0039cbde6f6f00eca2018731da4f1ef3c23/Makefile#L36)):_

> ``` Makefile
> check: dist/hpc/tix/hstox/hstox.tix
>   hpc markup $(HPC_DIRS) --destdir=dist/hpc/html $< > /dev/null
>   hpc report $(HPC_DIRS) $<
> ```

BTW this seems to be leaving artifacts on my command line

e.g. ;2;1;22 

---

_[test/toxcore/.gitignore, line 2 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/24#-KMG3OT8PFjjsjYNFU2Z:-KMG3OT8PFjjsjYNFU2_:-1184236682) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/886eecdf305c7b884d90e0f9c3d3ea5d53a28a02/test/toxcore/.gitignore#L2)):_

> ```
> /*.dSYM
> /*_main
> ```

Was this removed in a bad merge?

---

_[test/toxcore/Makefile, line 2 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/24#-KMG4MXWXFwFsGxBMM9T:-KMG4MXXKf6Kk93TOE_B:218155697) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/16a9a0039cbde6f6f00eca2018731da4f1ef3c23/test/toxcore/Makefile#L2)):_

> ``` Makefile
> CFLAGS    :=                  \
>   -std=gnu99              \
> ```

this may break my system, testing now, standby

---

commit.message:
Add support for test flavours to the main Makefile.

This is needed for TokTok/toxcore#4.

This is needed for TokTok/toxcore#4.
